channel.title: The Phantom (Neutral, investigative)
channel.description: > **The Phantom, Neutral, Investigative** :mag_right: > = > The phantom is a unique class and is guaranteed to spawn in reaper games > > Passive 1: Ally: if the reaper dies you will commit suicide. > > Passive 2: Ghostly: immune to death for 2 times > > Day Ability 1: Brethren: See what the dead say at night, 2 uses > > Day Ability 2: Empower: empower the reaper's abilities and make him go through occupation and target change, 2 use > > Night Ability: Ally or Not: Discover if a player resembles the reaper or not (classes that resemble appear to resemble the reaper are, the reaper, the psychic, the illusionist, all of the cult, the phys, and the herbalist) > > Goal: must live to see the reaper win

item.title: The Phantom (Neutral, investigative)
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
? Sure reaper maybe be boring and weak but it like auto wins at the end, reaper normally can survive the night without a problem

I mean i don’t want it to be too OP and you won’t be even talking to dead chat you will only spy on them nothing else

Read full topic

item.title: The Phantom (Neutral, investigative)
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Well they don’t know that the phantom is looking at their chat the phantom doesn’t even talk

ok the second one I’m confused on

Read full topic

item.title: The Phantom (Neutral, investigative)
item.dc:creator: Whammerist
item.description:
if that’s true, imagine like how bad this role is
you need to both ensure the survival of yourself and the lowest WR NK in the game, purely with the abilities of FINDING out your allies in the first place and talking to a dead chat that doesn’t want to give you information.
as it stands i legitimately dont think this role is capable of winning 1 in 100 games.

Read full topic

item.title: The Phantom (Neutral, investigative)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Vamps aren’t NK. They are neutral Chaos.

Besides, the Cult and Unseen are already better Vampires.

Read full topic

item.title: The Phantom (Neutral, investigative)
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Well TOS have a similar thing going on look at vamps they are allies and win together but they are not a faction

Also the phantom needs to live in order to win with the reaper, meaning if the reaper won but the phantom is dead he won’t win

Read full topic

item.title: The Phantom (Neutral, investigative)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
If you want an NK with an ally, I think a new NK would be better.

Read full topic

item.title: The Phantom (Neutral, investigative)
item.dc:creator: Whammerist
item.description:
ok but like that doesn’t help the reaper ~ at all
a) the dead aren’t going to talk to a role that’s aiding the nk
b) if you’re constantly whispering the dead chat to the nk you’re outting both of yoursel
c) like if you want this to work give the phantom actually abilities to aid the reaper

Read full topic

item.title: The Phantom (Neutral, investigative)
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Well ty for the feedback

Well discovering the reaper is helpful to the reaper, you can use you’re brethren ability to find out what the dead are talking about and report it to the reaper, you use you’re ally or not and tell a reaper this dude is psychic, phys, cult, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: The Phantom (Neutral, investigative)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
It’s not an NK with allies.

It’s an extra faction.

An NK is a solo killer. Reaper is good right now.

Read full topic

item.title: The Phantom (Neutral, investigative)
item.dc:creator: Whammerist
item.description:
this role does literally nothing to help the reaper
like you discovering the reaper isn’t you helping the reaper

Read full topic

item.title: The Phantom (Neutral, investigative)
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
I disagree, I feel like reaper needs an ally to try to help him out since reaper is weak

This conversation has given me some ideas though

Also i thought it would be a fun idea to have reaper have an ally, sorc have an enemy, and poss have no one

Read full topic

item.title: The Phantom (Neutral, investigative)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
NKs are a one man team. No NK should have any sworn allies.

Reaper and Possessor are better solo.

Read full topic

item.description:
If you have any suggestions/feedback be free to let me know!

item.title: The Phantom (Neutral, investigative)
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
The Phantom, Neutral, Investigative

The phantom is a unique class and is guaranteed to spawn in reaper games

Passive 1: Ally: if the reaper dies you will commit suicide.

Passive 2: Ghostly: immune to death for 2 times

Day Ability 1: Brethren: See what the dead say at night, 2 uses

Day Ability 2: Empower: empower the reaper’s abilities and make him go through occupation and target change, 2 use

Night Ability: Ally or Not: Discover if a player resembles the reaper or not (classes that resemble appear to resemble the reaper are, the reaper, the psychic, the illusionist, all of the cult, the phys, and the herbalist)

Goal: must live to see the reaper win

Read full topic
